text:
Overview
This part motivates the use of deep learning for time series forecasting and provides frameworks
to allow you to work through a new forecasting problems systematically and ensure that your
ﬁnal model is robust and defensible. After reading the chapters in this part, you will know:
 The promise that the capabilities of deep learning methods oﬀer for addressing challenging
time series forecasting problems (Chapter 1).
